body:
Hi, 

I need help. After restarting my internet, I still lag on avicus. This happened yesterday too. However, when I go on other servers, I do not lag. The lag I get is like people are teleporting all around. I tried to switch from 1.7 and 1.8 and joined Avicus using those two versions, however, I still lag.

Help? ;n;

P.S. My internet is fine.
body_tagged:

I need help. After restarting my internet, I still lag on avicus. This happened yesterday too. However, when I go on other servers, I do not lag. title: How do I solve this issue?

replies.body: I've actually been getting similar lag, so I don't think it's just you.
replies.body_tagged: I've actually been getting similar lag, so I don't think it's just you.

replies.body: It could've been Avicus otherwise just try going on later, the connection between you and the server could temporarily slow. Happens to me annoyingly a lot.
replies.body_tagged: It could've been Avicus otherwise just try going on later, the connection between you and the server could temporarily slow. Happens to me annoyingly a lot.

replies.body: Hmm, i think i got this earlier too, but i thought it was me. Don't think you're the only one.
replies.body_tagged: Hmm, i think i got this earlier too, but i thought it was me. Don't think you're the only one.

replies.body: I get 5 bars and it takes 50 seconds to join a game and load the terrain. GG
replies.body_tagged: I get 5 bars and it takes 50 seconds to join a game and load the terrain. GG

replies.body: This is the exact same for me, I wonder what it is?
replies.body_tagged: This is the exact same for me, I wonder what it is?

replies.body: I think it's just the server, not you, but I could be wrong.
replies.body_tagged: I think it's just the server, not you, but I could be wrong.

replies.body:
Sounds like it's server side.
Hopefully it'll end soon.
replies.body_tagged:
Sounds like it's server side.
Hopefully it'll end soon.

replies.body: It's the server, I had one week of this before.
replies.body_tagged: It's the server, I had one week of this before.

replies.body: Check your activity monitor and click on the tab saying network. Anything soaking up your network you should check on.
replies.body_tagged: Check your activity monitor and click on the tab saying network. Anything soaking up your network you should check on.
